definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: There was only one scorpion. But the sting was in the tail.
sentences.chinese: 只剩一隻蠍子了，但是刺卻在尾巴上。

sentences.english: Nobody carries a grudge better than this sign.
sentences.chinese: 沒有哪個星座比蠍子更容易產生怨恨情緒了。

sentences.english: The scorpion says, ‘Because if I do, I will die too’.
sentences.chinese: 蠍子就說，‘我要是蜇你的話，我自己也會死的。’

sentences.english: Scorpions live mostly in the desert , but can handle all kinds of weather.
sentences.chinese: 蠍子多半住在沙漠中，卻可適應各種天候。

sentences.english: As your birthday month gets under way, you’ll feel a great sense of relief.
sentences.chinese: 隨着蠍子們誕辰月的啓動，你會感到一種解脫。

sentences.english: Originally there is countless only crawled contains poisonous scorpions.
sentences.chinese: 原來裏面竟然是無數只爬動着的含有劇毒的蠍子。

sentences.english: GuanWenJun took the scorpion find butyl victory help make money, just meet zhang Mary.
sentences.chinese: 管文軍拿着蠍子找丁勝利幫忙賺錢，正好遇到張瑪麗。

sentences.english: Fully-charged Devourers will rip apart a large Scorpion army quite quickly.
sentences.chinese: 完全充能的吞食者可以非常迅速的幹掉大量的蠍子。

sentences.english: The sting of a scorpion is in its tail.
Scorpions have unique sensory combs, called pectines, on their dorsal sides.
sentences.chinese: 蠍子的背側上長有一排被稱之爲櫛狀器的獨特感應梳。

sentences.english: And this is the dungeon itself. At those times it was full of poisonous snakes and scorpions.
sentences.chinese: 這就是地牢，當時裏面有許多毒蛇和蠍子。

sentences.english: Did my father really die from the sting of a scorpion?
sentences.chinese: 我父王真是被一隻毒蠍子咬死的嗎？

sentences.english: In the fable Hulushan is closing the scorpion essence and the snake essence.
sentences.chinese: 傳說葫蘆山裏關着蠍子精和蛇精。

sentences.english: King Scorpion dates from a time when Egypt was composed of two separate kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 蠍子王的故事發生在埃及尚分爲兩個王國的時期。

sentences.english: Like a poisonous bomb or something. Almost like how the high temps have psi storm and the defilers have plague.
sentences.chinese: 就像高級聖堂武士擁有心靈風暴，或者蠍子的黃霧。

sentences.english: After that, spam Scorpions and change to Avatars and Stealth Tanks when teched up.
sentences.chinese: 在這之後，暴蠍子並在攀科技後轉型到聖靈與隱坦。

definition: now hot, now cold/(of one's mood, affection etc) to alternate
Leo (star sign)/Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
to court/to go steady/to be dating
Leo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
meaty flesh from the underbelly of the carp
Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 室女座[Shi4 nu:3 zuo4]
(coll.) presenting as unfriendly and blunt, but warm and tender inside (loanword from Japanese "tsundere")
to be in a tangle/to nag
to sever all relations with sb/determined/decisive
